title: Stamper 2017 Preface to Word by Word

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Stamper makes to achieve her purpose of introducing the reader to the book.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Stamper makes to achieve her purpose of introducing the reader to the book.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
